snippet.title: Vertical Shift - Oculus App Labs | Steam Early Access LAUNCH CHRISTMAS EVE 2021
snippet.description:
Vertical Shift is a new kind of VR E-Sport. Fly through the city of Orion and arenas equipped with your Zenith Suit, an advanced movement system. Your Zenith Suit is equipped with Grapple Hooks, Jet Packs, and Gliders, giving you ultimate control over your flight. Challenge your skills with PvP and PvE.

COMING CHRISTMAS EVE TO STEAM AND OCULUS APP LABS

Song by Kent Osborne
Video edited by Venk Potula

Wishlist us on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1807480/Vertical_Shift/

Social  Media
https://linktr.ee/VerticalShift
Join our Discord - https://discord.gg/xDbK7rs
